metadata.title: CVE-2018-18651 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.00. catalog->getNumPages() in AcroForm.cc allows attackers to launch a denial of service (hang caused by large loop) via a specific pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. This is mainly caused by a large number after the /Count field in the file.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication this affects poppler

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
